attributes.comment:
What!!!?!??!?!

First the Citizenship Act makes my kid a citizen through the process of law, but I still have to do a
complex and expensive process to prove she's a citizen. To federal agencies which last time I
checked report to the same Congress that made the law.

Now you want it to cost me a month's mortgage, to get the certificate that my kid is entitled to
through the action of law, in addition to taking 15 hours of my time?

That's just outrageous. Some costs are part of running government, and if we're overspending on
pointless war that makes us less safe, maybe it's time to raise taxes on the people making that
decision instead of all of our grandchildren.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
